name: Duskreach
description:
Play a small creature who's looking to venture into the wilds, and see how long they can last. Harvest trees and stone, build tools, grow berries, and keep well-lit! You'll need it when darkness comes, and the shadow starts trying to destroy you. Brave the darkness, and even harness its power! See how long you can last.

This was a short game made in a month as a personal goal I hope you enjoy it!
